C. 20202 Re: Vidya Sagar PAHWA (India) Gentlemen: Enclosed are documents (including certified English translations of documents in 5 foreign language. 11 any) relating to the foreign education of the subject. Please provide uo with an advisory interpretation of the level and major field of educational attainment of the subject, in terms of education in the United States. Please return our enclosures. Your cooperation in this matter will be sincerely appreciated. Very truly yours, 11/6/68 U. S.
